trans-unit.source: Represents the <xref uid="langword_csharp_<cookieHandler>" name="<cookieHandler>" href=""></xref> configuration element.
trans-unit.target: 表示<xref uid="langword_csharp_<cookieHandler>" name="<cookieHandler>" href=""></xref>配置元素。

trans-unit.source: The `<cookieHandler>` element is a child element of the `<federatedAuthentication>` element; the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.FederatedAuthenticationElement.CookieHandler%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is set to an instance of the CookieHandlerElement class.
trans-unit.target: `<cookieHandler>`元素是子元素的`<federatedAuthentication>`元素;<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.FederatedAuthenticationElement.CookieHandler%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性设置为 CookieHandlerElement 类的实例</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.FederatedAuthenticationElement.CookieHandler%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The `<cookieHandler>` element is used to configure the cookie handler used by the Session Authentication Module (SAM), which is represented by the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule> class.
trans-unit.target: `<cookieHandler>`元素用来配置使用由会话身份验证模块 (SAM)，表示<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule>类</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule>的 cookie 处理程序

trans-unit.source: A cookie handler can be configured in one of the following ways: - To configure a chunked cookie handler, set the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.Mode%2A> property to either <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerMode> or <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerMode> and set the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.ChunkedCookieHandler%2A> property with the configuration element for your chunked cookie handler.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过以下方式之一中配置 cookie 处理程序:-若要配置分块的 cookie 处理程序，设置<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.Mode%2A>属性为<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerMode>或<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerMode>并设置<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.ChunkedCookieHandler%2A>使用分块的 cookie 处理程序的配置元素的属性。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.ChunkedCookieHandler%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerMode> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerMode> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.Mode%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.CustomCookieHandler%2A> property should not be set.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.CustomCookieHandler%2A>不应设置属性。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.CustomCookieHandler%2A>

trans-unit.source: - To configure a chunked cookie handler with the default chunk size, you can set the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.Mode%2A> property as mentioned earlier, but leave both the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.ChunkedCookieHandler%2A> and the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.CustomCookieHandler%2A> properties unset.
trans-unit.target: -配置与默认块区大小的分块的 cookie 处理程序，你可以将设置为<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.Mode%2A>属性，如前面所述，但保留同时<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.ChunkedCookieHandler%2A>和<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.CustomCookieHandler%2A>取消设置的属性。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.CustomCookieHandler%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.ChunkedCookieHandler%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.Mode%2A>

trans-unit.source: - To configure a custom cookie handler, set the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.Mode%2A> property to <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerMode> and set the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.CustomCookieHandler%2A> property with the configuration element that identifies the type of your custom cookie handler.
trans-unit.target: -若要配置自定义 cookie 处理程序，设置<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.Mode%2A>属性<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerMode>并设置<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.CustomCookieHandler%2A>与标识自定义 cookie 处理程序的类型的配置元素的属性。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.CustomCookieHandler%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerMode> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.Mode%2A>

trans-unit.source: This type must derive from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandler> class.
trans-unit.target: 此类型必须派生自<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandler>类。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandler>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.ChunkedCookieHandler%2A> property should not be set.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.ChunkedCookieHandler%2A>不应设置属性。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.ChunkedCookieHandler%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a chunked cookie handler.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个分块的 cookie 处理程序。

trans-unit.source: This property is equivalent to the `<chunkedCookieHandler>` child element of the `<cookieHandler>` element.
trans-unit.target: 此属性等效于`<chunkedCookieHandler>`的子元素`<cookieHandler>`元素。

trans-unit.source: It specifies a chunked cookie handler, an instance of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.ChunkedCookieHandler> class, to use.
trans-unit.target: 它指定一个的分块的 cookie 处理程序的实例<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.ChunkedCookieHandler>类中，以使用。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.ChunkedCookieHandler>

trans-unit.source: If it is set, the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.Mode%2A> property should be set to either <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerMode> or <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerMode>.
trans-unit.target: 如果已设置，<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.Mode%2A>属性应设置为<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerMode>或<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerMode>。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerMode> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerMode> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.Mode%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.Mode%2A> property is set to either of these values but the ChunkedCookieHandler property is not set, a chunked cookie handler with the default chunk size (<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.ChunkedCookieHandler.DefaultChunkSize?displayProperty=fullName>) is configured.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.Mode%2A>属性设置为上述任一值但 ChunkedCookieHandler 属性未设置，具有默认块区大小的分块的 cookie 处理程序 (<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.ChunkedCookieHandler.DefaultChunkSize?displayProperty=fullName>) 配置。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.ChunkedCookieHandler.DefaultChunkSize?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.Mode%2A>

trans-unit.source: Either the ChunkedCookieHandler property or the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.CustomCookieHandler%2A> property may be set, but not both.
trans-unit.target: ChunkedCookieHandler 属性或<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.CustomCookieHandler%2A>属性可以是组，但不是能同时。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.CustomCookieHandler%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.ChunkedCookieHandlerElement"></xref> that provides additional configuration for the chunked cookie handler.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.ChunkedCookieHandlerElement"> </xref>提供分块的 cookie 处理程序的其他配置。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a custom cookie handler type.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置自定义 cookie 处理程序类型。

trans-unit.source: This property must be set when a custom cookie handler is being configured.
trans-unit.target: 正在配置的自定义 cookie 处理时，必须设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: This property is equivalent to the `<customCookieHandler>` child element of the `<cookieHandler>` element.
trans-unit.target: 此属性等效于`<customCookieHandler>`的子元素`<cookieHandler>`元素。

trans-unit.source: It specifies a custom cookie handler type to use.
trans-unit.target: 它指定要使用的自定义 cookie 处理程序类型。

trans-unit.source: If this property is set, the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.Mode%2A> property must be set to <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerMode>.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置此属性，<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.Mode%2A>属性必须设置为<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerMode>.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerMode> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.Mode%2A>

trans-unit.source: The custom type specified by this property must be derived from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandler> class.
trans-unit.target: 此属性指定的自定义类型必须派生自<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandler>类。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandler>

trans-unit.source: Either the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.ChunkedCookieHandler%2A> property or the CustomCookieHandler property may be set, but not both.
trans-unit.target: 请<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.ChunkedCookieHandler%2A>属性或 CustomCookieHandler 属性可能集，但不是能同时。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.ChunkedCookieHandler%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Configuration.CustomTypeElement"></xref> that defines the custom cookie handler type.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Configuration.CustomTypeElement"> </xref>定义自定义 cookie 处理程序类型。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the domain value for cookies written by the handler.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置处理程序编写的 cookie 的域值。

trans-unit.source: Represents the `domain` attribute of the [\<cookieHandler\>](../Topic/%3CcookieHandler%3E.md) element.
trans-unit.target: 表示`domain`属性[ \< cookieHandler\>](../Topic/%3CcookieHandler%3E.md)元素。

trans-unit.source: The domain value.
trans-unit.target: 域值中。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为一个空字符串。

trans-unit.source: Gets a new cookie handler based on the configuration properties.
trans-unit.target: 获取新 cookie 处理程序基于的配置属性。

trans-unit.source: This method returns a cookie handler that is consistent with the configuration.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回的 cookie 处理程序的配置一致。

trans-unit.source: The cookie handler returned will be either a chunked cookie handler or a custom cookie handler depending on how the configuration properties are set.
trans-unit.target: 分块的 cookie 处理程序或自定义 cookie 处理程序，具体取决于如何设置配置属性将返回的 cookie 处理程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement>。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement>

trans-unit.source: The cookie handler.
trans-unit.target: Cookie 处理程序。

trans-unit.source: This will be an instance of <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandler"></xref> or <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.ChunkedCookieHandler"></xref> depending on the kind of handler that is configured by the properties of the current instance.
trans-unit.target: 这将是实例<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandler"></xref>或<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.ChunkedCookieHandler"></xref>根据配置的当前实例的属性的处理程序的种类。

trans-unit.source: A cookie handler cannot be created from the properties of the current instance.
trans-unit.target: 无法从当前实例的属性创建 cookie 处理程序。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the <xref uid="langword_csharp_httpOnly" name="httpOnly" href=""></xref> property of the cookies written by this handler should be set.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，指定是否<xref uid="langword_csharp_httpOnly" name="httpOnly" href=""></xref>应设置此处理程序编写的 cookie 的属性。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref uid="langword_csharp_httpOnly" name="httpOnly" href=""></xref> property should be set; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref uid="langword_csharp_httpOnly" name="httpOnly" href=""></xref>属性应设置; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the cookie handler mode.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置的 cookie 处理程序模式。

trans-unit.source: A valid <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerMode"></xref> value that indicates the kind of cookie handler that is being configured.
trans-unit.target: 一个有效<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerMode"></xref>值，该值指示正在配置的 cookie 处理程序的类型。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerMode"></xref>, which indicates a chunked cookie handler.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerMode"> </xref>，指示分块的 cookie 处理程序。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the base name for any cookies written by the handler.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置处理程序编写任何 cookie 的基名称。

trans-unit.source: Represents the `name` attribute of the [\<cookieHandler\>](../Topic/%3CcookieHandler%3E.md) element.
trans-unit.target: 表示`name`属性[ \< cookieHandler\>](../Topic/%3CcookieHandler%3E.md)元素。

trans-unit.source: The base name for the cookies.
trans-unit.target: Cookie 基名称。

trans-unit.source: The default is “FedAuth”.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为"FedAuth"。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the path value for cookies written by the handler.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置处理程序编写的 cookie 的路径值。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the path.
trans-unit.target: 包含路径的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the lifetime of cookies issued by the handler.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置处理程序发出的 cookie 的生存期。

trans-unit.source: Represents the `persistentSessionLifetime` attribute of the [\<cookieHandler\>](../Topic/%3CcookieHandler%3E.md) element.
trans-unit.target: 表示`persistentSessionLifetime`属性[ \< cookieHandler\>](../Topic/%3CcookieHandler%3E.md)元素。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.TimeSpan> that represents the cookie lifetime.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.TimeSpan>表示 cookie 的生命周期。</xref:System.TimeSpan>

trans-unit.source: The default is 0 days (“0.0:0:0”).
The value must be a value between 0 (“0.0:0:0”) and 365 (“365.0:0:0”) days.
Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the cookie should be used only with SSL.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，指定是否应仅与 SSL 结合使用 cookie。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the cookie should only be used over an SSL connection; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果仅应通过 SSL 连接，则使用 cookie否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。
